title: LittleMsSam's Sims 4 Mods
snippet: Fixed an issue with the Caretaker option on Infants/Toddler to be able to add the Caretaker relationship to a Nanny not showing up on them. Fixed an issue with Scruberoo causing LEs when used on some objects. Added support for Floralorial - using the spell on a plant will now also add the loot to plants around it in a radius of 25.

title: littlemssam | CurseForge Pro
snippet: I use this Option to better plan & sync my Mods between CurseForge & Patreon's Early Access Features. Of course, you can also subscribe here if you want, instead of Patreon, but it is totally fine, if you want to wait a little longer before you can download/install my Mods on here for free :)

title: LittleMsSam's Sims 4 Mods
